Class InterbankController

java.lang.Object
controllers.InterbankController
public class InterbankController
extends java.lang.Object
This is the controller for performing transaction on the bank side

    • payRental

      public PaymentTransaction payRental​(CreditCard card, double amount, java.lang.String content) throws java.io.IOException, InvalidEcoBikeInformationException
      Perform actions for connecting to the interbank server and pay rental
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be deducted
      amount - The amount to be deducted
      content - Information about the transaction
      Returns:
      A PaymentTransaction record if the transaction is successfully, null otherwise
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      InvalidEcoBikeInformationException
